p: Another potential application of NTAP in the food industry is the decontamination of food processing surfaces and equipment. In fact, a novel plasma system has been designed to decontaminate slicers, in which the cutting blade of the equipment constitutes one of the electrodes of the dielectric discharge system (Leipold et al., 2010). These authors obtained an effective inactivation of L. innocua inoculated on the cutting blade, representing a novel approach for decontaminating food processing equipment which could be applied to other surfaces, such as conveyors.
